Subject: Newspace - Server deleted, need transfer of licenses
Description:
Hello Team,

Newspace had an incident that deleted their server, they lost everything on there and we proceeded to raise the server from scratch. Now we just need their old license to be transfered to this server ID: IWPDIRG0

Best regards,
What_We_Know__c:
4/23/2025

- Reached out to customer to check is account manager sent him the replacement license

4/17/2025
- Vlad Vladut contacted me via teams and told me that he is not the account manager and that Luz Zhang is the account manager
- Contacted Luz Zhang via teams requesting assistance in getting new license over to the customer

4/16/2025
- Discovered that Vlad Valdut could possibly be the account manager for Newspace
- Reached out in teams to get assistance from Vlad to get new license for this server: IWPDIRG0
- Server experienced a catastrophic event in which server was burnt
- Customer has created a new server and requires license for it
- Sent customer an update
Solution_Comment__c:
Customer experienced a catastrophic event which rendered hardware to be replaced and needed license to complete recovery

Reached out to the account manager requesting he provide replacement license to customer

Customer has received license and request to close case
